name: Kurple Fantasy
description: Kurple Fantasy is a mostly indica strain that shows off her beauty in deep hues of purple, brightened by a starry coat of crystal trichomes. In 2012, Kurple Fantasy took 2nd place in the High Times Denver Medical Cannabis Cup in the indica category. A sweet grape aroma accents the full-body experience of this indica, whose effects are often described as easy, relaxed euphoria. According to its breeders at Imperial Genetics, Kurple Fantasy is a cross between â€™92 OG Kush and Old Man Purps.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Happy, Euphoric, Focused, Depression, Stress, Pain, Headaches, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy
